aoplib4j API Documentation (0.0.5)

Packages
org.aoplib4j.failurehandling Package containing the classes and annotations for the Failure Handling aspect.
org.aoplib4j.failurehandling.internal Package containing the internals of the implementation for the Failure Handling Aspect.
org.aoplib4j.fieldvalidation Package containing the classes and annotations for the Failure Validation aspect.
org.aoplib4j.fieldvalidation.internal Package containing the internals of the implementation for the Field Validation Aspect.
org.aoplib4j.gof.observer Package containing the classes for implementing the Observer Pattern.
org.aoplib4j.gof.observer.internal Package containing the internals of the implementation of the Observer pattern.
org.aoplib4j.modularity Package containing the classes for expressing the modularity concept.
org.aoplib4j.modularity.internal Package containing the internals of the boundary violation aspect.
org.aoplib4j.policy.compiletime This package contains the compile time policy enforcement aspects.
org.aoplib4j.policy.runtime Package containing the runtime policy enforcement aspects.
org.aoplib4j.testing.internal Package containing the internals of the implementation of verify aspect.
org.aoplib4j.uml Package containing the classes for the generation of UM diagrams.
org.aoplib4j.uml.internal Package containing the internal implementation of for the generation of UM diagrams.
